item.title: Analogue Journey Part 4 Fountain Pens
item.description: This is the third article in my series about exploring a more analogue existence. If you’re interested you may want to check out part 1, part 2, and part 3 before continuing. I always thought that fountain pens were kind of neat. A quaint throwback to a simpler time where people put pen to paper when issuing an invitation to dinner, and when manners and etiquette were the order of the day.
